title: AstralytiQ: No-Code Forecasting & BI Platform
description: Built a no-code platform for automated forecasting, EDA, and dashboards adopted by business users. Enabled one-click ML predictions for 40+ SKUs and plug-and-play model integration. Automated ETL/cloud deployment, reducing the manual reporting cycle by 80%.

title: MBC Department Management System
description: Developed a MERN stack portal with JWT role-based access, analytics, and reporting for over 1,000 records. Its modular UI and automated Excel workflows saved 4+ staff hours weekly. Integrated batch analytics, which reduced manual data entry errors by 30%.
